challenges.name: Even or Odd
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print "EVEN" if n is even, otherwise print "ODD".

challenges.name: Positive, Negative or Zero
challenges.description: Print POSITIVE, NEGATIVE or ZERO depending on the sign of n.

challenges.name: Maximum of Two
challenges.description: Read two integers a and b, print the larger one. If equal, print either.

challenges.name: Leap Year Checker
challenges.description: Given a year y, print YES if it is a leap year, otherwise NO. Use Gregorian rules.
challenges.notes: Leap year if divisible by 400, or divisible by 4 but not by 100.

challenges.name: Minimum of Three
challenges.description: Read three integers and print the smallest.

challenges.name: Absolute Value
challenges.description: Print the absolute value of given integer n.

challenges.name: Triangle Validity
challenges.description: Given three sides a, b, c, print YES if they can form a triangle, otherwise NO.
challenges.notes: Valid if a + b > c, a + c > b, b + c > a.

challenges.name: Ticket Pricing
challenges.description: Given age, if age < 12 ticket is 50, if 12–17 ticket is 100, else 150. Print price.

challenges.name: Multiple of Both
challenges.description: Given n, print "BOTH" if n is divisible by 3 and 5, "THREE" if only by 3, "FIVE" if only by 5, otherwise "NONE".
